Também chamadas de “Traduções livre”, sã: Also called Free Translations, are those that convert original texts from other languages into Portuguese for unofficial purposes, therefore, there is no need to have legal validity. For example: abstracts, research papers, articles in general, letters, etc.
São traduções especializadas em materiai: They are specialized translations of technical materials. They convert into Portuguese original texts from another language, which have a specific language for a certain area. Example: Abstracts, research projects, documents, contracts, theses, manuals, etc.
